/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a bridge, providing a panoramic view of the bustling cityscape below. The highway, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees on one side and buildings on the other. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements respectively. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the city and the highway.
